response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and the time and resources we've dedicated to its development, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I am offering this remarkable product to you for $15,000. I trust that you will find immense value in it. Let's make this extraordinary opportunity yours today!", "product_price": 15000}
